name: Out of Bolts!
description:
Description :
Just a simple arcade game made in Godot for Mini Jam 84 : Bubbles.

Controls :
Space - Jump
W , A - Left , Right
LMB - Throw Bolt
RMB - Reload (Only if close of box)
How to Play :
Try to reach the highest score possible!
Be careful you don't run out of bolts or you will explode.
If the bubbles reach the water level, the water will rise.
